Name: Champagne Marguerite
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with champagne.
Review: A classic cocktail from the 1860's revived in 2014 by Sean Ware of the London Cocktail Club with Demi-Sec champagne. We've used brut but compensated for this with a dash of sugar syrup.
History: Created in January 2014 for Laurent-Perrier by Sean Ware of the London Cocktail Club, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Champagne Marguerite contains 161 calories
Garnish: Lemon wedge, edible flowers & seasonal berries
